Title: Establishes a municipal solar planning grant program
Summary: Establishes a municipal solar planning grant program for municipalities to receive grants for plans to develop solar energy systems on agricultural land and commercially-zoned properties in such municipalities; creates a database to track such solar energy system distribution.
LawCode: Add Art 54 Title 17 §§54-1701 & 54-1702, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to establishing a municipal solar planning grant program
